items.name: Cozy Coffee
items.tnc:
• Purchasers are required to download the complimentary Frasers Experience (FRx) app and sign up as an FRx member to qualify for this promotion.
  • The promotion is only valid on Frasers eStore within the FRx app or online at www.frasersestore.com for members who make a purchase on Frasers eStore using GrabPay or a credit/debit card, while stocks last.
  • Upon order confirmation, members are not entitled to cancel his/her Order. For more information, please visit here.
  • Consumer advisory — Frasers Property Retail Management Pte. Ltd (FPRM), the holder of FRx Gift Card stored value facility does not require the approval of the Monetary Authority of Singapore. Consumers (users) are advised to read the terms and conditions carefully.
  • FRx Gift Cards are accepted at participating retailers ("Gift Card Participating Merchants") at the malls managed by FPRM ("Frasers Property Malls"), the full list of which may be obtained from http://bit.ly/FrasersDGC.
  • All other terms and conditions pertaining to the FRx Programme remain unchanged. For more information, please visit here.
  • For any further assistance, please email help@frasersestore.com.
